column2: text
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_stimulate_growth}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases growth in the local province (reduces in enemy provinces).
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_damage_building}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nInflicts damage upon a building in the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assault_units}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\nInflicts damage upon all units in the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_block_army}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\nModifies the campaign movement range of the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_damage_walls}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nDamages the walls of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_hinder_replenishment}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\nModifies the replenishment of the target army.
Missile Resistance. Damage of missile attacks is reduced by this amount.
Ward save. Any type of damage is reduced by this amount.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_gain_influence}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nGains [[img:icon_influence]][[/img]]influence.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assassinate}}[[/col]] (Target: Hero)\nKills the target [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_increase_trade}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases tradable resources produced in the local province.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
Magic Resistance. Damage of [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_magical.png]][[/img]]magical attacks is reduced by this amount.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nReduces {{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} in the local province.
The option to carry out a lightning strike battle will appear on the Pre-Battle panel. Enabling this prevents reinforcements from joining the battle.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_cleanse_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_untainted]][[/img]]Untainted in the local province.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
Physical Resistance. Damage of non-magical attacks is reduced by this amount.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assault_unit}}[[/col]] (Target: Army)\nInflicts damage upon a unit in the target army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_colossal_deliverance}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nDamages the walls of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_wound}}[[/col]] (Target: Hero)\nWounds the target [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_establish_pirate_cove}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nEstablishes a Pirate Cove in the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption in the local province.
Fire Resistance. Damage of [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_flaming.png]][[/img]]flaming attacks is reduced by this amount.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_ultimate_deliverance}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nDamages the walls, buildings, and lowers the settlement level of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_skv]][[/img]]Skaven corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_assault_garrison}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nInflicts damage upon the garrison of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_corruption}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases the amount of [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]]Vampiric corruption in the local province.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_colossal_deliverance}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nDamages the walls of the target settlement.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_increase_mobility}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\nIncreases the campaign movement range of the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_steal_technology}}[[/col]] (Target: Settlement)\nIncreases research rate for 3 turns.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_replenish_troops}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\nIncreases replenishment of the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_scouting}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\nIncreases the parent army's chance of finding a magic item after winning a battle.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_scavenge}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\nIncreases the {{tr:icon_income}}income of post-battle loot earned by the parent army.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_training}}[[/col]] (Assist Army)\nGrants experience per turn to units serving in the parent army.

[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_increase_slave_income}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases the [[img:icon_income]][[/img]]income from [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]slaves in the local province.
Aura. Any unit standing within this character's aura in battle will receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus.
Ward save. Any type of damage is reduced by this amount.
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_boost_income}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases the income generated by buildings in the local province (reduces in enemy provinces).
[[col:yellow]]{{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}[[/col]] (Constant Local Effect)\nIncreases {{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} in the local province (reduces in enemy provinces).
